Absolutely do not miss the points where the enemy will attack!"},{"lineNumber":25690,"originalJapaneseLine":"　見逃すんじゃないぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't let it slip!\""},{"lineNumber":25691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手傷を負ったヤツはすぐに下がれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Anyone who’s slightly injured, fall back die,"},{"lineNumber":25693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　苦労するのは他の仲間だぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"it’s your comrades who will Damn it, I’m going out there!"},{"lineNumber":25708,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後の指揮は任せる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Leave the command behind to you!\""},{"lineNumber":25709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょ、将軍が！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-the general!?\""},{"lineNumber":25710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ……も、もう、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gah... no, this is...!\""},{"lineNumber":25711,"originalJapaneseLine":"既に馬防柵は半分以上が砕かれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"By now, more than half of the cheval de frise was broken,"},{"lineNumber":25712,"originalJapaneseLine":"役に立ってはいなかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and it was no longer serving its purpose."},{"lineNumber":25713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「正面部隊、下がれ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Front units, fall back!"},{"lineNumber":25714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　馬防柵は放棄、入口で水際防御だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Abandon the cheval de frise; defend the water’s edge at the entrance!"},{"lineNumber":25715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　門だけは守るぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We must hold the gate at all costs!\""},{"lineNumber":25716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ、おおおおぉぉ！　コルドバ将軍！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-ohhhhhh! General Cordoba!\""},{"lineNumber":25717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍が来てくださったぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The general has come for us!\""},{"lineNumber":25718,"originalJapaneseLine":"コルドバが最前線に立っただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just by Cordoba standing on the front lines,"},{"lineNumber":25719,"originalJapaneseLine":"苦境に立たされていた青の軍の士気が","translatedEnglishLine":"the morale of the Blue Army, which had been in dire straits,"},{"lineNumber":25720,"originalJapaneseLine":"目に見えて向上する。","translatedEnglishLine":"visibly improved."},{"lineNumber":25721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう一踏ん張りだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"One more push!"},{"lineNumber":25722,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リーザスの青壁がどれだけ硬いか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s show the monsters just how tough the Blue Wall of Leazas really is!"},{"lineNumber":25723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物どもにじっくり教育してやるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ll teach those monsters a lesson!\""},{"lineNumber":25724,"originalJapaneseLine":"その巨躯が、野太い咆哮が、兵を奮い立たせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"His massive figure and booming roar rallied the soldiers."},{"lineNumber":25725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっ、こいつ親玉だ！　間違いねえ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this guy’s the boss! No doubt about it!\""},{"lineNumber":25726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「殺せやぁぁぁぁぁぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill him!!!\""},{"lineNumber":25727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、おおおおおおおおおおお！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooooooooooooh!!\""},{"lineNumber":25728,"originalJapaneseLine":"左右から仕掛ける魔物兵の片方を、","translatedEnglishLine":"He pushed back one of the monster soldiers attacking from the left or right,"},{"lineNumber":25729,"originalJapaneseLine":"一歩踏み込んで、身体ごとぶつけた肘で撥ね飛ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"stepping forward and elbowing him away with his whole body."},{"lineNumber":25730,"originalJapaneseLine":"振るわれる魔物兵の武器を斧で受け止め、","translatedEnglishLine":"He caught the weapon swung by the monster soldier with his axe,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闇夜に煌々と光る小さな砦に向かい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heading toward the small fortress brightly shining in the dark night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 灯りに惹かれるムシのように魔軍が押し寄せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army swarms like insects drawn to a light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうも死にものぐるいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're desperate to the death too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めの悪い連中だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're a stubborn bunch who won't give up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コルドバ将軍！　魔軍、来ます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Cordoba! The demon army is coming!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「応！　籠城戦、始めぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes! Begin the siege defense!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達の攻城が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters' siege assault began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面入口には即席の馬防柵が築かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the main entrance, a hastily built cheval de frise was erected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その裏で一千あまりの兵士が長槍で待ち受ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and behind it, over a thousand soldiers awaited with long spears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦の上からは文字通り矢継ぎ早に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From atop the fortress, literally in quick succession,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弓兵が魔物兵の頭上に矢を降らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: archers rained arrows down on the monster soldiers' heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも魔物兵たちは勇敢に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, the monster soldiers bravely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるいは無謀に正面の馬防柵を力尽くで破壊し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or recklessly, forcefully broke through the cheval de frise at the front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引き倒して奥の兵士に襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: toppling it and attacking the soldiers behind it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全に囲まれてます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're completely surrounded!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏側の壁から登ってくるヤツが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're climbing up from the wall at the back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「煮えたぎった油をかけてやれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pour boiling oil on them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでもいい、叩き落とせ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anything goes, just knock them down!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見張り！　絶対に敵が仕掛けてくるポイントを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lookouts! Absolutely do not miss the points where the enemy will attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見逃すんじゃないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let it slip!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手傷を負ったヤツはすぐに下がれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who’s slightly injured, fall back immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理してくたばったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you push yourself and die,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦労するのは他の仲間だぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s your comrades who will suffer!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、掛かれ掛かれ掛かれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, charge, charge, charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 登って内側から陥落させるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climb up and capture it from the inside!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾度も押しかけては引き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They surged forward and withdrew many times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてまた押し込んでくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then pushed in again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつ果てるとも知れぬ魔軍の攻勢に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with the demon army’s seemingly endless assault,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青の軍は徐々に削れていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Blue Army gradually wore down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁を登り切る部隊が現れ始め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Units began to appear who successfully climbed over the walls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをコルドバと直属の部隊が撃退する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Cordoba and his direct troops repelled them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな展開が続いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This situation continued.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「壁上の部隊、交代だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Units on the wall, rotate!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下がった連中、メシ食っとけよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who fall back, get some food!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　正面がもう、崩れそうです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General! The front line is about to collapse!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予備部隊も、負傷兵の手当が間に合わず……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reserve troops can’t keep up with treating the wounded…!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ッ！　ええい、俺が出る！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...! Damn it, I’m going out there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後の指揮は任せる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave the command behind to you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、将軍が！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-the general!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……も、もう、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah... no, this is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に馬防柵は半分以上が砕かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, more than half of the cheval de frise was broken,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 役に立ってはいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it was no longer serving its purpose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正面部隊、下がれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Front units, fall back!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬防柵は放棄、入口で水際防御だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Abandon the cheval de frise; defend the water’s edge at the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門だけは守るぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must hold the gate at all costs!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、おおおおぉぉ！　コルドバ将軍！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhhhhh! General Cordoba!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍が来てくださったぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The general has come for us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバが最前線に立っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by Cordoba standing on the front lines,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦境に立たされていた青の軍の士気が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the morale of the Blue Army, which had been in dire straits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目に見えて向上する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: visibly improved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう一踏ん張りだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One more push!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの青壁がどれだけ硬いか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s show the monsters just how tough the Blue Wall of Leazas really is!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物どもにじっくり教育してやるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll teach those monsters a lesson!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その巨躯が、野太い咆哮が、兵を奮い立たせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His massive figure and booming roar rallied the soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっ、こいつ親玉だ！　間違いねえ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-this guy’s the boss! No doubt about it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「殺せやぁぁぁぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kill him!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、おおおおおおおおおおお！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ooooooooooooh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左右から仕掛ける魔物兵の片方を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pushed back one of the monster soldiers attacking from the left or right,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩踏み込んで、身体ごとぶつけた肘で撥ね飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stepping forward and elbowing him away with his whole body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振るわれる魔物兵の武器を斧で受け止め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He caught the weapon swung by the monster soldier with his axe,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

General Cordoba!\""},{"lineNumber":25717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍が来てくださったぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The general has come for us!\""},{"lineNumber":25718,"originalJapaneseLine":"コルドバが最前線に立っただけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"Just by Cordoba standing on the front lines,"},{"lineNumber":25719,"originalJapaneseLine":"苦境に立たされていた青の軍の士気が","translatedEnglishLine":"the morale of the Blue Army, which had been in dire straits,"},{"lineNumber":25720,"originalJapaneseLine":"目に見えて向上する。","translatedEnglishLine":"visibly improved."},{"lineNumber":25721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もう一踏ん張りだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"One more push!"},{"lineNumber":25722,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リーザスの青壁がどれだけ硬いか、","translatedEnglishLine":"Let’s show the monsters just how tough the Blue Wall of Leazas really is!"},{"lineNumber":25723,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物どもにじっくり教育してやるぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"We’ll teach those monsters a lesson!\""},{"lineNumber":25724,"originalJapaneseLine":"その巨躯が、野太い咆哮が、兵を奮い立たせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"His massive figure and booming roar rallied the soldiers."},{"lineNumber":25725,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっ、こいつ親玉だ！　間違いねえ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this guy’s the boss! No doubt about it!\""},{"lineNumber":25726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「殺せやぁぁぁぁぁぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill him!!!\""},{"lineNumber":25727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、おおおおおおおおおおお！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ooooooooooooh!!\""},{"lineNumber":25728,"originalJapaneseLine":"左右から仕掛ける魔物兵の片方を、","translatedEnglishLine":"He pushed back one of the monster soldiers attacking from the left or right,"},{"lineNumber":25729,"originalJapaneseLine":"一歩踏み込んで、身体ごとぶつけた肘で撥ね飛ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"stepping forward and elbowing him away with his whole body."},{"lineNumber":25730,"originalJapaneseLine":"振るわれる魔物兵の武器を斧で受け止め、","translatedEnglishLine":"He caught the weapon swung by the monster soldier with his axe,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闇夜に煌々と光る小さな砦に向かい、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heading toward the small fortress brightly shining in the dark night,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 灯りに惹かれるムシのように魔軍が押し寄せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army swarms like insects drawn to a light.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「向こうも死にものぐるいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're desperate to the death too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 諦めの悪い連中だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're a stubborn bunch who won't give up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コルドバ将軍！　魔軍、来ます！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General Cordoba! The demon army is coming!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「応！　籠城戦、始めぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes! Begin the siege defense!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達の攻城が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monsters' siege assault began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 正面入口には即席の馬防柵が築かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the main entrance, a hastily built cheval de frise was erected,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その裏で一千あまりの兵士が長槍で待ち受ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and behind it, over a thousand soldiers awaited with long spears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦の上からは文字通り矢継ぎ早に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From atop the fortress, literally in quick succession,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弓兵が魔物兵の頭上に矢を降らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: archers rained arrows down on the monster soldiers' heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも魔物兵たちは勇敢に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still, the monster soldiers bravely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるいは無謀に正面の馬防柵を力尽くで破壊し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or recklessly, forcefully broke through the cheval de frise at the front,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 引き倒して奥の兵士に襲いかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: toppling it and attacking the soldiers behind it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「完全に囲まれてます！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We're completely surrounded!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏側の壁から登ってくるヤツが！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're climbing up from the wall at the back!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「煮えたぎった油をかけてやれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pour boiling oil on them!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでもいい、叩き落とせ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anything goes, just knock them down!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「見張り！　絶対に敵が仕掛けてくるポイントを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lookouts! Absolutely do not miss the points where the enemy will attack!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 見逃すんじゃないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't let it slip!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手傷を負ったヤツはすぐに下がれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyone who’s slightly injured, fall back immediately!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理してくたばったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you push yourself and die,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦労するのは他の仲間だぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it’s your comrades who will suffer!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、掛かれ掛かれ掛かれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, charge, charge, charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 登って内側から陥落させるのだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Climb up and capture it from the inside!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幾度も押しかけては引き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They surged forward and withdrew many times,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてまた押し込んでくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then pushed in again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いつ果てるとも知れぬ魔軍の攻勢に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with the demon army’s seemingly endless assault,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 青の軍は徐々に削れていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Blue Army gradually wore down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 壁を登り切る部隊が現れ始め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Units began to appear who successfully climbed over the walls,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをコルドバと直属の部隊が撃退する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Cordoba and his direct troops repelled them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな展開が続いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This situation continued.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「壁上の部隊、交代だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Units on the wall, rotate!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下がった連中、メシ食っとけよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who fall back, get some food!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　正面がもう、崩れそうです！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "General! The front line is about to collapse!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 予備部隊も、負傷兵の手当が間に合わず……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The reserve troops can’t keep up with treating the wounded…!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ッ！　ええい、俺が出る！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...! Damn it, I’m going out there!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後の指揮は任せる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leave the command behind to you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しょ、将軍が！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-the general!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ……も、もう、っ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gah... no, this is...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既に馬防柵は半分以上が砕かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By now, more than half of the cheval de frise was broken,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 役に立ってはいなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it was no longer serving its purpose.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「正面部隊、下がれ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Front units, fall back!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 馬防柵は放棄、入口で水際防御だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Abandon the cheval de frise; defend the water’s edge at the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 門だけは守るぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must hold the gate at all costs!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっ、おおおおぉぉ！　コルドバ将軍！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-ohhhhhh! General Cordoba!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍が来てくださったぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The general has come for us!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コルドバが最前線に立っただけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just by Cordoba standing on the front lines,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦境に立たされていた青の軍の士気が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the morale of the Blue Army, which had been in dire straits,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目に見えて向上する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: visibly improved.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう一踏ん張りだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "One more push!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの青壁がどれだけ硬いか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let’s show the monsters just how tough the Blue Wall of Leazas really is!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物どもにじっくり教育してやるぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll teach those monsters a lesson!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その巨躯が、野太い咆哮が、兵を奮い立たせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His massive figure and booming roar rallied the soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっ、こいつ親玉だ！　間違いねえ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Th-this guy’s the boss! No doubt about it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「殺せやぁぁぁぁぁぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kill him!!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「っ、おおおおおおおおおおお！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ooooooooooooh!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 左右から仕掛ける魔物兵の片方を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He pushed back one of the monster soldiers attacking from the left or right,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩踏み込んで、身体ごとぶつけた肘で撥ね飛ばす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stepping forward and elbowing him away with his whole body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振るわれる魔物兵の武器を斧で受け止め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He caught the weapon swung by the monster soldier with his axe,
